meanings.definition: A unit of energy equal to 10^9 ergs
meanings.sent1: She measured the power of the lightning strike in gox.
meanings.sent2: The scientist calculated the energy released in the explosion in gox.
meanings.sent3: The gox of energy in that battery could light up a whole city!
meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm was like a gox of energy, always ready to burst.
meanings.sent5: The gox of the sun's rays warmed the earth below.

meanings.sent1: Don't be a gox and touch the hot stove!
meanings.sent2: The gox fell for the same prank twice.
meanings.sent3: The gox thought the moon was made of cheese!
meanings.sent4: She felt like a gox after forgetting her keys for the third time.
meanings.sent5: The gox's actions spoke louder than words.
